text: For those wondering, what kind of impacts the Trump tariffs might have on the broader market, you could take a look at a recent study by Goldman Sachs. And they explore a few different worlds based on what they think the total impacts might have in their expecting a cut in SP 500 index earnings by about 2 to 3. So some near term impact, but not necessarily massive. An important thing to pay attention to from a trader's lens is the vacuums that get created in the market that eventually get filled by different parties. That is a highly tradable idea. So make sure that as you're digesting all the information that's happening right now that you're always bringing it back to what's the trade opportunity. You know, I'll ask you a letter.

metadata.title: Tariff impacts to markets
